Package it.seba.juno.player

Class ColorDropStrategy

java.lang.Object
it.seba.juno.player.AbstractDropStrategy
it.seba.juno.player.ColorDropStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
DropStrategy
public class ColorDropStrategy extends AbstractDropStrategy
It is the concrete implementation of a drop strategy where the card dropped have the same color of the discard pile. Color has the priority over the value.
Author:
Sebastian Rapetti

    UnoCard
    dropCard()
    Drop a card checking first the color, if the npc player has no cards of the same color of the discard pile, checks for the same value.
